Class ArgumentFactory

Factory to create the transfer wrapper for an argument in a RPC call.

| Improve this Doc View Source

Create(IStore, Object, Boolean)

Creates a RPC transfer wrapper for a function call argument.
Declaration
public static Argument Create([NotNull] IStore store, [CanBeNull] object obj, bool bTransferByValue)
Parameters
Type Name Description
IStore store Clients remote store instance.
System.Object obj The object to be wrapped.
System.Boolean bTransferByValue If true, the object will always be transferred by value. If the argument is too large to fit in an , the argument will be shared to all receivers using the store. If false, the argument may be, depending on the type, transferred by reference.
Returns
Type Description
Argument The wrapped argument.
| Improve this Doc View Source

Resolve(IStore, Argument)

Resolves the transferred RPC argument to be used in the local function call.
Declaration
public static object Resolve(IStore store, Argument arg)
Parameters
Type Name Description
IStore store Clients remote store instance.
Argument arg Argument to be resolved.
Returns
Type Description
System.Object The unwrapped argument.
Exceptions
Type Condition
System.ArgumentException If the argument references an object in the store, but the reference cannot be resolved.
System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException If the argument type is unknown.
| Improve this Doc View Source

Resolve(IStore, List<Argument>)

Resolves a list of transferred RPC arguments to be used in the local function call.
Declaration
public static object[] Resolve(IStore store, List<Argument> args)
Parameters
Type Name Description
IStore store Clients remote store instance.
System.Collections.Generic.List<Argument> args Argument to be resolved.
Returns
Type Description
System.Object[] A list of the unwrapped arguments.
